highlights: Designed and implemented data transformation from internal platforms into client facing proposal documents using Java and Spring Boot.
Combined underwriting web components to be hosted in a single application server, reducing costs by 66% using React, NodeJS, and Nginx.
Created and maintained CI/CD pipelines and Infrastructure as Code to build and deploy apps in AWS Cloud.
Developed Python workflows to automate data aggregation from multiple sources, reducing manual effort and improving efficiency to support a ransomware-resilient software currency program.

Designed a granular analytics methodology that correlates device type, hostname, and agent version, providing actionable insights on over 30,000 corporate devices to enhance remediation strategies and improve endpoint security.
Advanced future integration efforts by centralizing scripts and developing REST APIs for seamless data access via Microsoft Defender and PowerBI.
Collaborated with senior engineers in development of internal Python-based REST APIs.
Aided in agile development of automated incident handling system, saving over 350 manual hours yearly.
Engaged in a diverse range of educational and networking workshops facilitated by senior level staff, including C-level executives.
Enhanced the development and delivery of diverse internal curricula, focusing primarily on Web Development, iOS Development, and React.js, catering to over 50 high school students.
Delivered personalized one-on-one coaching to students on programming projects and career preparation.
Assisted with providing maintenance to the classroom space and the technology within.

projects.name: ExplainThis
projects.description: A site which provides concise code snippet explanations using OpenAI's GPT 3.5 davinci text model.

projects.name: RecycleIT
projects.description: A web app that aids users in finding nearby recycling centers using their postal code or precise location.

awards.title: Palantir Launch
awards.summary: Participated in various technical workshops and received career mentorship from Palantir engineers. Developed a project on Palantir's Foundry platform using various datasets.

awards.title: HackMIT
awards.summary: Led back-end development of "Sisyphus", a web app designed to serve as a habit tracker and diary, developed with React and Electron.js.
